headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Let it snow
content:
Keep an eye on the skies, the forecast calls for snow around Christmas and New Year’s in San Andreas.~n~~n~You don’t need to resist the temptation to start throwing the white stuff around - you can now make and throw snowballs.~n~~n~Press ~INPUT_DETONATE~, to collect snowballs, and aim and throw them like any other projectile weapon.

And be sure to look out for gifts from Santa under the tree today to help celebrate the Holiday Season with a bang.
